name: In the Matter of William T. SMITH
docket_number: No. 502, Disciplinary Docket No. 2-Supreme Court; No. 69 DB 85 Disciplinary Board

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: In the Matter of William T. SMITH.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 2nd day of October, 1995, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania dated August 28, 1995, the Petition for Reinstatement is granted.
Pursuant to Rule 218(e), Pa.R.D.E., petitioner is directed to pay the expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement.
CASTILLE, J., dissents.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of William T. SMITH.
No. 502, Disciplinary Docket No. 2—Supreme Court.

Oct. 2, 1995.
